original_text: Such large crowds gathered around him that he got into a boat and sat in it, while all the people stood on the shore.
korean_text: 큰 무리가 그에게로 모여 들거늘 예수께서 배에 올라가 앉으시고 온 무리는 해변에 서 있더니

sentences.original_text: Such large crowds gathered around him
that he got into a boat
while all the people stood on the shore
